post.body:
[0list](../0list.bit) has been updated to the latest version of [ZeroTalk](../Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit).

New feature:
- Mute topic creator or commenter

You can find [more informations](../Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:104:New+version:+0.5.2) about this cool new feature on the blog of the ZeroNet developer.
